        Description copied from interface: Blueprint

      • getCredentialStoreEnabled

        public String getCredentialStoreEnabled(String serviceName)
        Get whether the specified service is enabled for credential store use. 
             
       {
         "service_settings" : [
         { "name" : "RANGER",
           "recovery_enabled" : "true",
           "credential_store_enabled" : "true"
         },
         { "name" : "HIVE",
           "recovery_enabled" : "true",
           "credential_store_enabled" : "false"
         },
         { "name" : "TEZ",
           "recovery_enabled" : "false"
         }
       ]
     }
        Specified by:
        getCredentialStoreEnabled in interface Blueprint
        Parameters:
        serviceName - - Service name.
        Returns:
        null if value is not specified; true or false if specified.
